Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to applications for major capital improvement rent increases
Summary: Relates to applications for major capital improvement rent increases; requires owners to submit copies of all permits with their applications for major capital improvement rent increases; denies applications if permits are fraudulent or not included.
LawCode: Amd §§26-405 & 26-511, NYC Ad Cd; amd §6, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd §4, Emerg Hous Rent Cont L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the emergency housing rent control law, in relation to applications for major capital improvement rent increases
